Name: This Picture
About the game: This picture is a puzzle game of folding parts of the image of the whole picture. A picture appears in front of you for a short time, then it is disassembled and mixed into fragments. The important task is to move the parts so that a complete image is obtained. At first the picture is divided into a small number of pieces, but then in case of your success, the number of fragments increases and thereby the puzzle becomes more complicated. The game has several levels with different images. All control with the mouse.
